name: SimonPI
description:
A classic simon game, but with PI digits.

You can play in two different modes :

  • Classic (Play button) : Observe the sequence, and reproduce it.
  • Free Mode (Free button) : Go as far you can, and see your score.

Assets from Kenny.

(Tips : In classic mode you can make a quick start, to do this start to write before the buttons light up.)
